predicate.note: Frames file for 'enjoin' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: prohibit, prevent

role.descr: secondary predication on arg1 or action

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The FTC said it would seek *trace* to enjoin the proposed acquisition in a federal trial court, but declined to specify which one.

roleset.note: Args 2 and 3 are predicted from 'prohibit' but may or may not occur with enjoin.
